# MCMC setting
A common call to `stan` looks like that:

```{r, eval=F}
fit_model2 <- rstan::stan(file = file.path('model.stan'), 
                   data = stan_data_model,
                   iter = warmup + iter, 
                   chains = chains,
                   warmup = warmup, 
                   pars = pars,
                   seed = seed)
```


.center[
Has the `seed` an impact on the estimation process?

1.Yes<br/>
2.No
